name: sync::Arc::<T, A>::new_zeroed_in

core::alloc::Layout::new.doc: Constructs a `Layout` suitable for holding a value of type `T`.

sync::Arc::<T>::allocate_for_layout.doc:
Allocates an `ArcInner<T>` with sufficient space for
 a possibly-unsized inner value where the value has the layout provided.

 The function `mem_to_arcinner` is called with the data pointer
 and must return back a (potentially fat)-pointer for the `ArcInner<T>`.

core::ptr::mut_ptr::<impl *mut T>::cast.doc: Casts to a pointer of another type.
